title: CipherTrace Expands Monitoring Platform to 700 Tokens
text:
CipherTrace Expands Monitoring Platform to 700 Tokens

Cryptocurrency News 1 hour ago (Oct 15, 2019 11:01AM ET)

CipherTrace Expands Monitoring Platform to 700 Tokens United States-based blockchain security firm CipherTrace has expanded its crypto intelligence platform to 700 tokens. With the expanded platform launched on Oct. 15, CipherTrace now allows clients to trace more than 87% of the transactional volume of the top 100 cryptos such as Ether (ETH), Tether (USDT), (BCH) and (LTC), the firm said in a press release. Continue Reading on Coin Telegraph

CipherTrace Expands Monitoring Platform to 700 Tokens
